questions.question: Can two students in the same group use the same nickname? If a teacher sees two "Honza" entries on the dashboard, is that acceptable or should nicknames be unique per group?
questions.reason: The PRD specifies students enter a nickname (REQ-GROUP-011) and teachers monitor a student list (REQ-DASH-005), but doesn't address uniqueness. Duplicate nicknames would make it hard for teachers to identify which student needs help.

questions.question: When the goal description is written in a non-English language (e.g., Czech), should the welcome message show the original goal text or an English translation? The AI responds in English, but the goal itself might not be.
questions.reason: REQ-CHAT-001 says students see a welcome message with the goal description, and AC-AI-01 explicitly mentions goals in Czech. But FC-003 only says the AI *responds* in English â€” it's unclear whether the goal description itself should be translated for the student.

questions.question: After a teacher resolves a help alert for a student, can that same student trigger new help alerts (e.g., goes off-topic again, or becomes inactive again)? Or is resolution a one-time dismissal?
questions.reason: REQ-DASH-004 covers resolving alerts and REQ-AI-007 covers warning cycle resets, but the interaction between resolving an alert and subsequent alert generation isn't specified. This affects how useful the alert system is in practice.
